question: Do you think women should be able to do all the same jobs that men do?

question: So can you share with us some tips that you learned speaking in IELTS?
transcript: With regards to speaking, my first tip would be do not stick to the script. Because many people think that taking detailed notes might help you speak more fluently. But in reality, it is just going to limit you to everything that you have written and make you sound unnatural. And my second advice would be do not try to remember everything because well we will not be able to to be honest. So instead of trying to say things words by words it'd be more efficient to divide your speech into different parts and just move from one part to another.

question: And my first, my third advice?
transcript: Let me think. Oh yeah, you should stop when you need to because, when you do not know what to say, you will tend to put a lot of filler words in it and it would make your speech sound very clumsy. So yeah, just take a break and rearrange your thoughts very carefully. And to be honest, a short speech is always better than one that ends with filler words. question: Would you like to start now, please?
transcript: A party that I genuinely enjoyed was my birthday party, which was held last year on the 11th of August at my place. It was a surprise party and I really liked it because my friends surprised me and it happened all of a sudden. And my best friend came from Canada after four years, which was very unexpected for me. the good thing about the party was that it had different stations in different corners of the room. For example, it had an art station, music station, so we were allowed to do whatever we wanted. there was this one particular thing that we did that was very memorable for me was we took our handprint on the canvas for the memory, which I still have it stored because my friends left for abroad. And whenever I look at it, it makes me feel better. So that was the best part about the party that was held. And I felt really happy because people do not do such things anymore. And it was all of a sudden and it was very special for me.
